entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Yarmouth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 a.m. ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 2:17 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 2:17 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
